spiritsExplanation: The primary spirit of this workout is 'Structured & Disciplined', with a score of 0.9, as evidenced by the detailed breakdown in the description with '7 rounds' of '4 exercises per round' and specified work and rest intervals, indicating a methodical and controlled approach to training. The presence of compound and isolation exercises, targeting all major muscle groups, further supports a structured format. 'High-Energy & Intense' is assigned a score of 0.7, driven by the full-body strength training with dumbbells, which inherently demands effort, and comments describing it as a 'sweat-it-out routine.' Lastly, there's a minor element of 'Flow & Rhythm,' with a score of 0.4, due to the continuous movement through different exercises without repetition, which creates a dynamic flow resonated by comments appreciating the fun and entertaining style. Other spirits such as 'Soothing & Restorative', 'Sport & Agility', and 'Outdoor & Adventure' were not considered due to lack of relevant indicators.
